metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Data Analysis
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Start your data science journey right with this hands-on introduction to the discipline of data analysis. In this course you'll learn the 5 key stages of the data analysis process and apply them to real data sets using Python libraries NumPy, pandas, and Matplotlib.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Pandas, NumPy, Jupyter Notebooks, Anaconda, Data Analysis Process, Quantitative Data Analysis
